stories.text:
Hey all -

I recently self-published "Law for Internet Entrepreneurs: 10 important U.S. legal cases about web design every tech founder, software engineer, & web developer should know"

Please email me at contact@xuova.com for a FREE digital copy of the book.

You can purchase the book here in multiple formats: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0B2HRPMKG/

I put together 10 very important U.S. legal cases that have shaped legal issues about Internet businesses.

These topics include:

- web scraping - online contracts - music streaming - software copyright and fair use - software patent - domain names and trademarks - copyright and fair use
stories.title: Show HN: I self-published “Law for Internet Entrepreneurs”

stories.title: Nationwide credit card processing outage?

stories.text:
A bit of googling gives the impression that I'm not the only person with this problem.

It doesn't seem to be linked to heavy usage of CPU or memory, and it does seem to go away after a reboot, but starts happening again fairly shortly after.

Has anyone sucessfully resolved it? This is driving me nuts!
stories.title: Ask HN: Is anyone else having audio glitches and pops on their M1 MacBook?

stories.text: I once read that it is possible to have a phone number (in the US) longer than 10 digits. How could this be done?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to get a long phone number?

stories.text: What would financial markets look like if the free market controlled interest rates and not a central bank?
